meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>mountain</kanji> <kanji>middle</kanji> <kanji>lake</kanji> is <vocabulary>lake Yamanaka</vocabulary>, a famous and very nice lake in Japan. It's also a lake that will help you to learn the lake kanji reading better.
readingMnemonic: The reading is the kun'yomi readings of 山 and 中, then the on'yomi reading of 湖.
